statements: DELETE FROM water_conservation_technologies WHERE description LIKE '%efficient%' AND impact_on_reduction > 0.5;
DELETE FROM organizations WHERE org_name = 'Company ABC';
DELETE FROM organizations WHERE location = 'New York' AND org_id = 10;
DELETE FROM ImpactMetrics WHERE tech_id = 2 AND impact_measure = 'Water Savings';
DELETE FROM ImpactMetrics WHERE tech_id = (SELECT tech_id FROM WaterTech WHERE tech_name = 'Reverse Osmosis');
DELETE FROM UserFeedback WHERE user_id = 12345 AND feedback_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM WaterSavingTechnologies WHERE technology_name = 'Smart Sprinkler System';
